Title: Tricks of the Trade
Writer: Aaron Korsh (created by), Rick Muirragui, Ethan Drogin (executive story editor)
Actors: Gabriel Macht, Patrick J. Adams, Rick Hoffman, Meghan Markle
Plot: Harvey and Mike try to prove that a woman accused of insider trading is innocent. Mike also tries to help Rachel study for the LSAT, but he soon finds out she is close to uncovering his secret.
